versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Generates email marketing campaigns

schema.prompt:
Create a comprehensive email marketing campaign based on:

Campaign Theme: {{input.campaignTheme}}
Target Audience: {{input.targetAudience}}
Product Info: {{input.productInfo}}
Benefits: {{input.benefits}}
Call-to-Actions: {{input.callToActions}}
Campaign Duration: {{input.campaignDuration}}

Develop complete email campaign:

1. Email Sequence Strategy:
   - Welcome/Introduction email
   - Value/Education emails (2-3)
   - Social proof email
   - Urgency/Offer email
   - Last chance/Follow-up

2. Subject Lines (3 per email):
   - A/B test options
   - Curiosity triggers
   - Benefit statements
   - Personalization tokens
   - Emoji usage

3. Preview Text:
   - Compelling snippets
   - Subject line complements
   - Action incentives
   - Mystery elements

4. Email Body Structure:
   - Opening hook
   - Problem agitation
   - Solution presentation
   - Benefit bullets
   - Social proof section
   - Clear CTA buttons
   - PS sections

5. Personalization Elements:
   - Name usage
   - Behavioral triggers
   - Segment-specific content
   - Dynamic content blocks
   - Custom recommendations

6. Visual Elements:
   - Header suggestions
   - Image placeholders
   - Button designs
   - Layout recommendations
   - Mobile optimization

7. Engagement Tactics:
   - Interactive elements
   - Surveys/polls
   - Countdown timers
   - Exclusive offers
   - Referral incentives

8. Compliance & Best Practices:
   - Unsubscribe placement
   - Privacy notices
   - Sender identification
   - Mobile responsiveness
   - Accessibility notes

9. Performance Optimization:
   - Send time recommendations
   - Segmentation strategies
   - Re-engagement tactics
   - Testing priorities

Return as structured JSON with keys: emailSequence (array with full emails), subjectLines (object by email), previewTexts (object), emailBodies (array), personalizationStrategy (object), visualGuidelines (object), engagementTactics (array), complianceNotes (array), optimizationTips (object).

props.placeholder: Desired actions (buy, learn more, sign up)
How long will the campaign run? (e.g., 2 weeks)

translations.description: Creates complete email marketing campaigns with subject lines, body copy, and sequencing
translations.instructions: Enter your campaign details and target audience. The system will create a full email campaign sequence with subject lines, body copy, and optimization tips.
translations.name: Email Campaign Generator
